Question
========
  
A coffee shop kept track of the number of chocolate muffins they sold per day, for a week. The numbers they obtained are 6, 8, 5, 10, 8, 6, 4.
Calculate the standard deviation of the sample.
  
Answerlist
----------
* 1.91
* 3.63
* 2.06
* 4.24

Solution
========
  
Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
